body: Definitely one of the best doujins I have ever seen on the site. The art is good and easy to follow, the style matches the characters from the anime, there are various different angles of different and same positions, the text doesn't get in the way, and it contains some of my all time favorite tags. An easy 10/10, SS+ tier doujin.

Im going to be honest kuroko as a character is shit. She calls the stupid railgun onee-sama yet they arent related, if only she knew how hard it is for us trying. I only like this because Kuroko physically is hot, same with Uiharu.
Damn.. this is really good and i've been looking for something like this (3)
Damn.. this is really good and i've been looking for something like this (2)
